experience.role: Tech Lead Quantitative Research & Trading Systems
experience.description: Lead quantitative trading strategies development with focus on statistical edge and risk management. Design backtesting frameworks and live trading systems. Apply ML and optimization for performance enhancement.
Fine-tuned Whisper for transcription and built AI inference systems. Developed scalable backend services with Docker, AWS, and integrated AI models using Python tech stack.
Developed backend services using Node.js, Express, and Nest.JS. Deployed on AWS with EC2, S3, Lambda. Set up CI/CD pipelines and managed Nginx for load balancing.

projects.name: Cloud-assist
